WHO WE ARE :
We’re one of the world’s largest insurance and investment management groups with over c.€1 trillion in total assets under management. Established in London in 1836, we have been providing insurance for our customers for over 180 years. With c.7000 employees we guard and look after the financial security of millions of people worldwide.

OUR GOAL:
To deliver outstanding value and security for customers, and sustainable growth for shareholders while taking a leadership role in the broader economy and in the provision of socially and economically useful products and services.

WHAT WE DO:
We enable our customers, who range from some of the world’s largest companies and funds to millions of individuals and families, to manage their financial futures whether by protecting against unforeseen events, helping to save for retirement or investing money to deliver growth over time. We deploy our strong balance sheet, our ability to understand and pool risk, our market insight and our capacity to create good value customer propositions for every customer, large or small. Our strong social purpose means that we strive at all times to do the right thing not just for our customers and shareholders, but for the broader economy and society at large.
